name: Cases with no movement
query:
SELECT 
name as Name,
lead_name as "Lead Name",
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Open' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Open Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Open' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Open Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Open' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Open Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Call Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Call Done Since 7 days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Call Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Call Done Since 15 days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Call Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Call Done Since 30 days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Scheduled' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Meeting Scheduled Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Scheduled' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Meeting Scheduled Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Scheduled' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Meeting Scheduled Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Conducted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Meeting Conducted Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Conducted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Meeting Conducted Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Meeting Conducted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Meeting Conducted Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Partly Documents Collected' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Partly Documents Collected Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Partly Documents Collected' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Partly Documents Collected Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Partly Documents Collected' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Partly Documents Collected Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Documents Received' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Documents Received Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Documents Received' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Documents Received Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Documents Received' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Documents Received Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Lender Selection' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Lender Selection Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Lender Selection' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Lender Selection Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Lender Selection' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Lender Selection Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Pending For Reporting Manager Approval Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Login Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Login Done Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Login Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Login Done Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Login Done' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Login Done Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Additional Doc Required' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Additional Doc Required Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Additional Doc Required' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Additional Doc Required Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Additional Doc Required' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Additional Doc Required Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Sanctioned' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Sanctioned Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Sanctioned' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Sanctioned Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Sanctioned' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Sanctioned Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc List' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Disbursement Doc List Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc List' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Disbursement Doc List Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc List' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Disbursement Doc List Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc Submitted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Disbursement Doc Submitted Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc Submitted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Disbursement Doc Submitted Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursement Doc Submitted' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Disbursement Doc Submitted Since 30 Days:Data:250',

(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursed' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'Disbursed Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursed' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'Disbursed Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'Disbursed' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'Disbursed Since 30 Days:Data:250',


(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'On Hold' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 7) as 'On Hold Since 7 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'On Hold' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 15) as 'On Hold Since 15 Days:Data:250',
(SELECT COUNT(l.name) from `tabLead` l where l.name = le.name AND status = 'On Hold' AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),l.modified) > 30) as 'On Hold Since 30 Days:Data:250'

FROM
`tabLead` le
